law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 215, effective July 12, 2006; and ch. 210, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 181, sec. 13, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 230, sec. 17, effective July 15, 2002.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). This section was amended by 2006 Ky. Acts chs. 149 and 210, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
